Hero.casossucesso: Take a look at some personal projects
Hero.sobre1: I'm a Quality assurance, currently specializing in agile testing, with extensive experience in Robot Framework and Selenium, and nearly 4 years of experience at one of the largest software houses in Latin America.
Hero.sobre2: Currently, I work with both manual and automated testing across a variety of products, languages, and platforms. Recently, I began leading an automation team, where I am responsible for making strategic decisions, setting goals, and continuously reporting results to our leadership.
Hero.sobre3: I believe that quality culture and processes are among the most important pillars in the software development lifecycle.
